channel.title: Dlresolve on leo_something
channel.description: Recent content in Dlresolve on leo_something

item.title: Ret2dlresolve in 64bit binaries
item.description: Ret2dlresolve is a really powerful tecnique to use in pwn challenges (even tho it’s not frequently seen). It’s useful when we don’t have libc leaks or don’t know the libc version.
